entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
